video.title: Filthy Riches
video.synopsis: Across America, independent entrepreneurs who aren't afraid to get their hands dirty make a living by harvesting eels, worms, wild mushrooms and more.

episodes.synopsis: Ray prepares for the upcoming eel run on the Delaware River, while Billy and his sons head out on their first ginseng hunt of the season.
episodes.title: Harvest Moon

episodes.synopsis: Michigan mushroom hunters Chris and Levena work quickly to fill an order, and Greg and Al take a risk on a tree infected with a fungus.
episodes.title: Go Big or Go Home

episodes.synopsis: Al takes on a tricky operation to fulfill a large burl order, Jim and Andy look for new places to dig, and Ray aims for a big haul.
episodes.title: No Guts, No Glory

episodes.synopsis: Greg and Al struggle with a stubborn burl, worm diggers Jim and Andy have competition, and Ray encounters a major storm.
episodes.title: Hungry for Money

episodes.synopsis: Jim and Andy lend a hand to some rookie worm diggers, Ray grapples with emu issues, and Greg and Al go to California.
episodes.title: High Stakes, High Reward

episodes.synopsis: Billy brings his sons along to search for a special type of ginseng root, and Ray patches up a hole in his weir to prevent eels from escaping.
episodes.title: Livin' Off the Land

episodes.synopsis: Billy enlists help from his son and some locals to help fulfill a 60-pound ginseng order, and Al and Greg tangle with a large madrone burl.
episodes.title: In It to Win It

episodes.synopsis: Al and Herb find a valuable pepperwood burl, Billy scrambles to fill a big order, and Ray seeks out a major catch before the season ends.
episodes.title: All or Nothing
